name: moorland blanket
sizes_available: 170 x 180 cm, 190 x 210 cm before border
notes:
moorland blanket cal runs from january 6 to february 24, 2017. for more information see:
[moorland blanket cal][1]
[pattern uses the neat wave pattern][2]

fifteen shades of stylecraft special dk are used to create the moorland colour palette :

pistachio
sage
grape
wisteria
duck egg
lime
meadow
mocha
violet
cloud blue
cypress
khaki
walnut
plum
storm blue

pattern contains optional stripes to make larger blankets.

yardage is based on 15 balls of stylecraft special dk for twin blanket - 30 balls for larger blanket.


  [1]: https://attic24.co.uk/patterns/cals/moorland-blanket/
  [2]: https://attic24.co.uk/posts/neat-wave-pattern/
